dmca.title: Emergency: Washington State complains of copying of its Disaster Guide
dmca.body:
Dear Sir or Madam:

I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property rights, said owner being named Washington State Department of Information Services ("DIS"). DIS is the owner of copyright and other intellectual property rights in and to the Customer Guide to the Data Center Disaster Recovery Program ("Guide"). Because of these rights, no one is authorized to manufacture, distribute, copy, sell and/or offer for sale products utilizing the Guide without the express permission of DIS.

It has recently come to our attention that the web site located at 
http://www.disaster-management.net/pdf/customer_guide.pdf 	   & http://www.emergency.management.net/pdf/customer_guide.pdf
is offering content from the Guide. The search query used to locate the Guide was: "Date Center Disaster Recovery Program" "Customer guide.
dmca.principal_name: Department of Information Services, Washington State
